subject: RE: SOLVED - Fix deployed to TEST (1.23.5)
body:
Quinn,

Great catch! Fix deployed and verified.

## DEPLOYED
- Added require() to src/app.js
- Version 1.23.5 on TEST
- Endpoint working: /api/analytics/event-creation
- Returns 11 events analyzed

## LESSON LEARNED
Azure Functions v4 requires explicit imports in entry point. Will document this in CLAUDE.md for future reference.

CalOps (Dash) should now see the event creation heatmap working.

â€” Fulton
